alert.note: Alert for Teton (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 14 at 12:18AM MDT until June 15 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Elevated river flows continue due to Sunday and Monday morning rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Wyoming, including the following county, Teton. * WHEN...Until 400 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1214 AM MDT, gauge reports still show multiple locations above Action Stage. Minor flooding may be occurring in the advisory area.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
